name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.http.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
description:
Specify the base amount of time in milliseconds upon which the
    exponentially increased sleep time between retries or failovers
    is calculated for WebHDFS client.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.warn.after.ms
description:
If looking up a single user to group takes longer than this amount of
    milliseconds, we will log a warning message.

name: dfs.client.slow.io.warning.threshold.ms
description:
The threshold in milliseconds at which we will log a slow
    io warning in a dfsclient. By default, this parameter is set to 30000
    milliseconds (30 seconds).

name: ha.health-monitor.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout for the actual monitorHealth() calls.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.joblist.cache.size
description: Size of the job list cache

name: fs.s3a.socket.send.buffer
description: Socket send buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.

name: dfs.blockreport.split.threshold
description:
If the number of blocks on the DataNode is below this
    threshold then it will send block reports for all Storage Directories
    in a single message.

    If the number of blocks exceeds this threshold then the DataNode will
    send block reports for each Storage Directory in separate messages.

    Set to zero to always split.
